title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: The chart shows the Minutes of at the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily street .
\\n The highest Minutes was 181 in the 45-54 Age followed by 157 % in the 25-34 Age , 181 % in 45-54 and finally 73 % in 55-64 .
gold: This graph shows the average time spent on social media in maputo , by age group . The highest being 15 - 24 year olds , who spent around 175 minutes a day . This is followed by 25 - 34 at 160 ; 35 - 44 at 125 ; 45 - 54 at 90 ; and 55 - 64 at 75 minutes .
